fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a player. If they are the owo owo, their own ability is secretly used on them. Now if they fail to post "owo" in each of their posts, they are lynched instantly (this counts as a ragequit).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - May not spawn without an owo owo (1460) in existence. Instantly becomes an owo owo if no owo owo is alive.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Become the owo owo and win as one.
